body_html: Yes, it seems that the compiler has vectorized some loops in the binaries using SSE4.1 instructions, while your CPUs only support SSE4a, which probably doesn't include some of them. We'll have to figure out how to instruct the compiler to stop optimizing them. I'm afraid you'll have to build from source until then 😕

body: Yes, it seems that the compiler has vectorized some loops in the binaries using SSE4.1 instructions, while your CPUs only support SSE4a, which probably doesn't include some of them. We'll have to figure out how to instruct the compiler to stop optimizing them. I'm afraid you'll have to build from source until then 😕
